title: End Times Prophesy in the Bible and the Anti-Christ - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/24/17
itunes:title: End Times Prophesy in the Bible and the Anti-Christ - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/24/17
description:
George Noory and Biblical scholar Mike Heiser discuss possible revelations of the End Times in the Bible, and whether it discloses the true identity of the Anti-Christ.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
